attributes.action: replace the £56.50 charge per practical driving test with a one off £50 charge for a learner's first practical test, with all future practical tests being free of charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Practical driving tests are an expensive process, and unnecessary amounts of money are demanded by the DSA to take them. 

The unlucky/poorly trained learners who fail could end up paying hundreds of pounds, and by the time they have passed they cannot actually afford the maintenance of a car. The longer they wait to actually use their licence, the less safe they're likely to be due to lack of practice.
